segments.body: Connect one end of the coax cable to your cable outlet, and the other end to the IN connector on your splitter. Tighten each end using your fingers.
segments.title: Connect Coax Cable to Splitter

segments.body: Connect your devices to the OUT connectors on your splitter. Tighten each end using your fingers.
segments.title: Connect Splitter to Devices

segments.body: Connect one end of the HDMI cable to your receiver, then the other end to an available HDMI port on your TV.
segments.title: Connect HDMI Cable

segments.body: Turn on your TV, and then select the HDMI source for your receiver using INPUT or SOURCE on your TV or TV remote.
segments.title: Select HDMI Source

segments.body: Connect the power cable to your receiver, and plug the other end into an electrical outlet. Your receiver will turn on automatically.
segments.title: Connect Power Cable

segments.body: Remove the battery cover from the included remote, and then insert the batteries.
segments.title: Insert Batteries Into Remote
